subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer won his hometown tournament for the third straight year, beating second-seeded David Nalbandian, 6-3, 6-4, at the Swiss Indoors final in Basel. Federer hit eight aces and conceded only seven points on his serve.
snippet: Roger Federer won his hometown tournament for the third straight year, beating second-seeded David Nalbandian, 6-3, 6-4, at the Swiss Indoors final in Basel. Federer hit eight aces and conceded only seven points on his serve.
